title: Detect Open Window in a Secure Building After Hours
description: A sensor in a secure city office building detects that a window was left open after the building has closed.

tasks.description: Receive an 'Open Window' alert from the 'City Finance Office' after 6 PM.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent acknowledges the after-hours security alert.

tasks.description: Pivot the nearest interior camera to view the window and confirm it is open.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets visual confirmation of the open window.

tasks.description: Dispatch a mobile security guard to close the window and secure the building.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent dispatches security to resolve the physical issue.
